{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC1900 |revision=(C1) |upc=889349349106 |ean=4712900349108 |asin=B01GK8ZXDE |series=AC1900 |est_release_date=06/03/2016 |fcc_date=08/02/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117A |manuf_rev=AC33 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACHC00 |ic_id=3568A-RTACHC00CAN |pcb_id= |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F2G16128A-BDB |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ASUS Router App, AiCloud support |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm; |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=D0:17:C2 |oui_eth=D0:17:C2 }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :''4K Streaming and Ultimate Gaming'' :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/}} {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/specifications/ Specifications] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900/HelpDesk/ Support page]
FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACHC00 MSQ-RTACHC00] (2016-08-02) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3083312 FCC Doc] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] (R/V2) - CPU: BCM4709A0 (@1.0GHz Dual Cores) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] - CPU: BCM4709C0 (@1.4GHz) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900P/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900U]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750]] (R/W/V2) *[[ASUS RT-AC67U]] (R/W) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] (V2)
===Overview=== *Dual-core processor for fast and responsive performance :with Wi-Fi, Ethernet and USB devices *Ultra-fast 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi router boosts speeds :up to 1900Mbps, 3x faster than 802.11n routers *Broadcom TurboQAM technology increases 802.11n speeds :to 600Mbps for 33% faster performance. *5x Gigabit Ethernet ports for fast wired network connections *AiProtection with Trend Micro for triple-strength network security, :plus robust Parental Controls and privacy protection *ASUS AiCloud lets you access, sync, share and stream :your files anywhere, on any internet-connected device *USB 3.0 port for 10x-faster data transfers than USB 2.0, :also includes one USB 2.0 port *ASUS Router App lets you control your network anywhere, :all without needing to boot up a PC
===Features=== *Airtime Fairness, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control *Dual WAN, IPTV support, Roaming Assist, Guest Network (3x) *VPN server: IPSec Pass-Through, PPTP Pass-Through, :L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server *VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client *Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer App comp.) :Image: jpeg, Audio: mp3, wma, wav, pcm, mp4, lpcm, ogg :Video: asf, avi, divx, mpeg, mpg, ts, vob, wmv, mkv, mov *AiCloud personal cloud service, 3G/4G data sharing *Printer Server: LPR protocol support :Multifunctional printer support (Windows only) *Download Master: Download scheduling :Support bt, nzb, http, ed2k :Support encryption, DHT, PEX and magnet link :Upload and download bandwidth control *AiDisk file server: :Samba and FTP server with account management
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac68u-rt-ac68p-rt-ac1900-rt-ac1900p.35759/ ''ASUS RT-AC68U/RT-AC68P/RT-AC1900/RT-AC1900P'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-AC1750]] (A1) - BCM4706 (@600MHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750 B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] (R/V2) - BCM4709A0 (@1.0GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] - BCM4709C0 (@1.4GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900U]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U]] (A1) - BCM4706 (@600MHz) :*[[ASUS RT-AC66R]] (Store by ''Best Buy'') :*[[ASUS RT-AC66W]] (White) *[[ASUS RT-N66U]] (B1) - BCM4706 (@600MHz) *[[ASUS RT-N66U C1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0GHz) :*[[ASUS RT-AC68P]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68P/ Product Page] :*[[ASUS RT-AC68U]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC68U/ Product Page] :*[[ASUS RT-AC68UF]] {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC68UF/ Product Page]
